text: @realDonaldTrump Same for Jacksonville?.. disclaim any legal liability for the spread of COVID-19, attendees asked to affirm, “By attending the event, you and any guests voluntarily assume all risks related to exposure to COVID-19 and agree not to hold DJT. … liable for any illness or injury.”
